name: Street Racing Simulator
description:
The ultimate car street racing simulator will have you blown with amazing city maps, desert maps and much more. Driving zone in these exotic street cars is something else! Beat the highway traffic and buy all the sports cards in the game!

Street Racing 3D is a highway traffic race game, with endless mode and unlimited levels. You can choose between, one way, two way, timer mode or bus bomb gameplay, the you have a driving zone, where you have to speed up! If you slow down, your bus is going to explode, just like in the film.

This car simulator 2021 game has many options and features to offer: fast sports cars, new 2021 cards, drifting, not, highway traffic and other objects and enemies you have to avoid. Game also features traffic racing games and other mini quest to improve your skills in city driving simulator
